text: new subparagraph state retirement system police dispatcher amend rsa vii by inserting after subparagraph g the following new subparagraph h a dispatcher for a law enforcement agency who as a job requirement meets all physical mental educational and other qualifications for the position police dispatcher amend rsa a to read as follows a any dispatcher mechanic electrician laboratory or clerical worker technical expert or other person employed in a police department or correctional facility who does not meet all the requirements of paragraph vii provided however that performance of such functions by any person who as a job requirement does meet all the requirements of paragraph vii shall not disqualify the person from membership in group ii new subparagraph fire dispatcher amend rsa viii by inserting after subparagraph b the following new subparagraph c an emergency dispatcher who provides dispatch and communications service for fire and emergency medical services of member municipalities and fire departments or for such services as are under contract with member municipalities and fire departments fire dispatcher amend rsa a to read as follows a any dispatcher mechanic electrician laboratory or clerical worker technical expert or other person employed in a fire department or by the division of forests and lands who does not meet all the requirements of paragraph viii provided however that performance of such functions by any person who as a job requirement does meet all the requirements of paragraph viii shall not disqualify the person from membership in group ii or lba hb fiscal note as introduced agencies contacted new hampshire retirement system
